page.title: 08Transport
page.content: Our area is well served by{road}and{ {rail}transport.The dominant feature is the M1{motorway}which passes through North/South.The motorway gives quick access to both Sheffield and Leeds. This quick access to major cities has brought about many changes in the way of new housing estates to cater for people who want to live in our semi-rural surroundings and commute to work via the motorway.We have a small railway{station}at Darton which is on the main Leeds/Sheffield line. A popular way of getting around is by bus.South Yorkshire Metropolitan Council have a transport policy that is heavily subsidised from the rates. For a nominal fee of 10pence,2pence for children,people can travel to Barnsley,our nearest town,5 miles away.Senior citizens are given free, unlimited travel in South Yorkshire.
